canvas_ivory.description: Primary background. Clean, calm, and neutral—anchors the composition.

anchor_ink.description: Main text and element outline. Provides intellectual gravity and balance.

element_slate.description: Secondary dark for diagrams or supportive text—cool and assertive.

pulse_red.description: Core energy. Highlights atomic center or urgent signals—use with intent.

forge_orange.description: Momentum and growth. Used for tools of transformation, like the cap.

dark_orange.description: Momentum and growth. Used for tools of transformation, like the cap.

aqua_glass.description: Fluid intelligence. Use for flow indicators, UI feedback, or system activity.

deep_teal.description: Structural intelligence. Used in interface mechanics, machines, and logical devices.

teal_frame.description: Neutral vessel tone. Used for object outlines, non-dominant interaction frames.

diagram_shadow.description: Shared with core ink. Reused for internal borders, shadows, and logical emphasis.

focus_gray.description: Shared with element slate. Use for metadata, subdued captions, or inactive states.
